com.interpss.core.aclf

Interface IAclfBus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AclfBus, AcscBus, BaseAclfBus<TGen,TLoad>, BaseAcscBus<TGen,TLoad>, BaseDStabBus<TGen,TLoad>, DStabBus, OpfBus, SEBus, Static3PBus
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AclfBusImpl, AcscBusImpl, BaseAclfBusImpl, BaseAcscBusImpl, BaseDStabBusImpl, DStabBusImpl, OpfBusImpl, SEBusImpl, Static3PBusImpl

    public interface IAclfBus
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'IAclf Bus'. interface to implment AclfBus as an extension.
    See Also:
    AclfPackage.getIAclfBus()
